question: 雇う
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>employ</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to employ</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You are going <vocabulary>to employ</vocabulary> more people to your business so you can make more money and eventually buy a <reading>yacht</reading> (<ja>やと</ja>). That's the dream life, it is.
